summary: Reservoir Link Energy Bhd proposes a private placement of up to 37,806,355 new ordinary shares, representing approximately 10% of the total issued shares. The placement aims to raise funds for business activities, specifically the Acquisition of PMSB.

utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Fully fund the acquisition of 30% equity interest in Propel Maxflo Sdn Bhd, involved in oil and gas products and services.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Mainly for renewable energy activities, including financing charges, staff-related costs, and general administrative expenses.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Fees for adviser, placement agent, company secretary, regulatory fees, contingencies, and other incidental expenses.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Upon completion of the Proposed Private Placement
